title: I've gotten the Instant Feedback Report more in the last 2 weeks than the last 3 years.
body: I guess RIOT is finally stepping up on punishing players, because i have gotten 5 feedback reports in the last 2 weeks, really good feeling

replies.body:
Nope, their system just started false banning.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/VYcZnWf1-regarding-the-most-recent-ban-wave-for-unauthorized-third-party-applications
That's not instant feedback. That's a manual scripting ban.
So you don't get feedback for reporting cheaters that are later banned manually?

Not currently. But it's on our list of things to tackle.

Currently you are only told when a player you reported is penalized for verbal abuse, harassment, hate speech, or intentional feeding.
What are your thoughts on adding for being penalized by Leaver Buster, even just for the catharsis
Huh, the more you know.

I save their name and check back in 3 weeks. I follow and see if I was wrong and if Riot is doing something.

So far 3 scriptors I reported seem to have been banned. That or they died since they had non-stop games in, then take long "vacations."

There's one I reported a month ago, he played for 2 days after I reported it and has not played since. Before that he was getting games in daily.

Hey Tantram, since you're a regular on the forums and very helpful, I'm hoping you can shine some light on a 14 day ban someone received. 

I saw this person post the other day and took a look at the match history and his profile and, well it seems like a lot of deaths under or near a turret, he was consistently building items, and no previous or at least recent history of feeding. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EbEsiyMM-unintentional-feeding-intentional-feeding-2k17

I don't know if there is something I'm missing or something that I can't see that could have left to the ban, but this seems like a case of poor play as opposed to feeding. I know the IFS is tuned to account for the occasional bad game so curious as to how this would seemingly slip through the cracks. Thanks Tantram and good luck doing magical computer things.

> because i have gotten 5 feedback reports in the last 2 weeks, really good feeling

I feel sorry for you. There are way "gooder good" feelings than what you described. Start with a hug.

I dunno. Altruism is a pretty heady feeling. Knowing that you had a real impact making the world a better place? Knowing that you gave someone else a wake up call and opportunity to reflect on (and change) the negative impact s/he had on other people?
The giddy, maniacal satisfaction of knowing that maybe - just maybe - they are now feeling the same pain and frustration that they put you through?

First, note that I can't tell if you're also being sarcastic like KORG, or if you're admitting a guilty pleasure. If it's the former, you can ignore this.

Schadenfreude is a thing too, but that only applies for some people. KORG seems to have a pessimistic attitude (based on the assumption of said schadenfreude in both OP and me, and the sarcastic responses conveying that assumption).

Personally, I don't really focus on the "that person has a chance to reform" part. But I do think about the "What that person said in game really hurt me. I'm happy that other people won't have to encounter that negativity, if only for a while." I enjoy good natured griefing my friends (like New Super Mario Bros. Wii or Dokapon Kingdom), but I don't get enjoyment from the pain others experience as part of their LoL bans. I might be able to if I tried hard, but my mind gravitates instead towards the hurt and sadness of the people the offender interacted with.

Semi-sarcastic. My idea was really more along the lines of giddy, maniacal satisfaction of knowing they got their just desserts and that you made it happen, rather than actually feeling pleasure over their pain.

Hmm. I dunno. Delusional can be anything.

Altrusim - the belief in or practice of disinterested and selfless concern for the well-being of others:
